statements.select: select a.*,b.ID,b.`Name`,b.userid,b.writetoken,b.readtoken,b.secretkey,IFNULL(c.PolyvinfoType,0) PolyvSource from w_polyvinfo_detail a left join w_polyvinfo b on a.PolyvInfo_ID = b.ID left join w_configuration c on a.System_Station_ID = c.System_Station_ID where a.System_Station_ID = #System_Station_ID#
statements.update: Update W_Configuration Set PolyvinfoType = #PolyvinfoType# where System_Station_ID = #System_Station_ID#
update w_polyvinfo set Name = #Name#,userid = #userid#,writetoken = #writetoken#,readtoken = #readtoken#,secretkey = #secretkey# where System_Station_ID = #System_Station_ID# and ID = #ID#
Update W_PolyvInfo_Detail set PolyvInfo_ID=#PolyvInfo_ID#,cataid = #cataid#,Valid = #Valid# where System_Station_ID = #System_Station_ID#
